name: Afterburner
body:
# Afterburner is on Pause

Despite our successful pilot in Fall of 2014, Afterburner is on pause until further notice. We still believe in the mission of teaching enterprise app development skills to young programmers, but we haven't found a scalable method. Weâ€™ll keep searching!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
